citation.title: Death by attack from a wild boar

news.title: Wild boars kill 3 Islamic State fighters and injure 5 others, reports say
news.summary: Groups fighting the Islamic State in northern Iraq got an unlikely assist from wild boars who killed three ISIS fighters and injured five others Sunday, according to media reports.

wikipedia.title: Wild boar
wikipedia.summary: The wild boar (Sus scrofa), also known as the wild swine or Eurasian wild pig, is a suid native to much of Eurasia, North Africa, and the Greater Sunda Islands.
